org.un.bungeni.translators.xpathresolver
Interface XPathResolverInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
XPathResolver
public interface XPathResolverInterface

This is the interface for the xpath resolvers of the AKOMA NTOSO translators. It is used to evaluate an xpath on a document.

Method Summary
 java.lang.Object evaluate(org.w3c.dom.Document aDocument, java.lang.String anXPath, javax.xml.namespace.QName aResultType)
          Evaluates the given xpath on the given document.
 

Method Detail

evaluate

java.lang.Object evaluate(org.w3c.dom.Document aDocument,
                          java.lang.String anXPath,
                          javax.xml.namespace.QName aResultType)
                          throws javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException
Evaluates the given xpath on the given document.

Parameters:
aDocument - The document on which the xpath must be evaluated
anXPath - The xpath to evaluate
aResultType - The type of the results (Strings, NodeSet and so on)
Returns:
an Object whose type is specified by the "aResultType" parameter
Throws:
javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException - if the Xpath is not well formed
